channel.title: Retail Transformation on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Retail Transformation on FinanClub

item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:93 Chances: Shopify (SHOP) reached $74.51 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a +1.48% change compared to its last close. Discover how Shopify’s groundbreaking Black Friday success indicates it’s ready for the beginning of a retail transformation. These consumer stocks had a great 2023, and the growth should continue into the new year.
